rule.name: CTMS_SiteBudget_Section
rule.description: Takes a CTMS_SiteBudget cdt and returns a section with the full Site Budget data
rule.definition: =#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "Budget", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Split Indicator", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!budget.splitIndicator, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Activity Type", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!budget.activityType, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Visit Name", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!budget.visitName, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Visit Type", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!budget.visitType, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Version", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!budget.version, readOnly: true ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Original Amount", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!budget.originalAmount, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Exception Amount", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!budget.exceptionAmount, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: "Description", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!budget.description, readOnly: true, height: "SHORT" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Split Status", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!budget.splitStatus, readOnly: true ) }, isCollapsible: true )
